story: You hear the hum of machinery in the distance as you explore this cyberpunk stronghold. As you turn a corner, you spot an interactive console. What do you do?

actions.action: Interact with the console and run a virus
actions.good: The console beeps and flashes as your expertise in hacking takes over. You successfully spread the virus, granting you access to valuable information. Your cyber skills pay off.
actions.bad: Your attempts to run a virus trigger an alarm. Turrets emerge from the walls and fire upon you. You take damage, but the console remains intact.

actions.action: Interact with the console and search for clues
actions.good: Your curiosity leads you to uncover important information about the gang's operations. The console reveals a hidden stash of valuable items, all yours for the taking.
actions.bad: In your search for clues, you accidentally touch a live wire. Your body jolts and you take damage. The console remains guarded.

actions.good: You shrug off the humming machinery and continue your exploration, avoiding the potential dangers of the interactive console.
actions.bad: Your ignorance leads you to miss out on valuable information and hidden items. Your failure is evident as you proceed with an uninformed perspective.
